column6: Cable and X-Force engage in deadly combat with the horror that is The Skornn! Who will make the final sacrifice in order to defeat the terrible mutant threat? Will X-Force survive?  Don't miss this stunning conclusion! Guest-starring The Fantastic Four and The Imperial Guard! Part 6 (of 6)
column8: | penciller (cover):Rob Liefeld | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Rus Wooton
